Key Match Events: Wendell Carter Jr. scored a season-high 19 points against the Knicks at Madison Square Garden
Pre-Game Insights: Jalen Suggs sent a text message to his coach, 'We're 0-3 against these guys, so there's something that we need to do to change this mentality'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Magic were well aware that in the past 34 days they had failed in all of their matchups against the Knicks
